docs.snippet: Injured New York Mets closer Jenrry Mejia was suspended for 80 games Saturday, the fourth player in 16 days banned under the major league drug program following a positive test for the steroid Stanozolol....
docs.lead_paragraph: Injured New York Mets closer Jenrry Mejia was suspended for 80 games Saturday, the fourth player in 16 days banned under the major league drug program following a positive test for the steroid Stanozolol.

headline.main: Mets' Mejia Banned 80 Games, 4th MLB Positive Within 16 Days
headline.print_headline: Mets' Mejia Banned 80 Games, 4th MLB Positive Within 16 Days

docs.snippet: The death of a black man shot in the back while fleeing a white police officer was the act of a racist cop, a minister told hundreds who gathered Saturday for the funeral of Walter Scott....
docs.lead_paragraph: The death of a black man shot in the back while fleeing a white police officer was the act of a racist cop, a minister told hundreds who gathered Saturday for the funeral of Walter Scott.

headline.main: Minister: Shooting of Black Man by White Officer Racist
headline.print_headline: Minister: Shooting of Black Man by White Officer Racist
